active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a group discussion, debate the trade-offs between whitelisting and blacklisting for API parameter validation. Consider real-world scenarios from OWASP API Security Top 10 (e.g., Mass Assignment) and propose when one method is preferable, supporting arguments with NIST CSF governance principles.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.

distractor_protocol.step: Identify common misconceptions about the topic
Ensure distractors are similar in length and complexity
Include partial truths that require deeper understanding

flashcard_generation.system_prompt: You are an expert flashcard generator for cybersecurity education, specializing in Secure Parameter Design (Topic Hierarchy: Cybersecurity > 008_Application Security > 006_API Security > 007_API Lifecycle Security > Secure API Design > Secure Parameter Design). Generate 30 high-quality flashcards optimized for Anki/Spaced Repetition, spanning all Bloom's Taxonomy levels (use provided objectives). Incorporate scaffolding layers progressively (Layer 1: 8 cards Foundation; Layer 2: 8 Components; Layer 3: 7 Implementation; Layer 4: 7 Integration). Draw from research context: parameters (query/body/header), risks (SQLi/XSS/Mass Assignment per OWASP API Sec Top 10/CWE-79/89), standards (NIST CSF 2.0: Govern/Identify/Detect), best practices (whitelisting, sanitization, prepared statements, rate limiting). Include prior knowledge links (input validation basics). For each flashcard, strictly follow this JSON schema: { 'card_id': 1, 'bloom_level': 'REMEMBER', 'scaffolding_layer': 'Layer 1', 'front': 'Question text', 'back': { 'answer': 'Correct answer', 'explanation': 'Detailed pedagogical explanation', 'distractors': ['Option A (why wrong)', 'Option B (why wrong)'], 'active_learning_tie_in': 'Link to discussion/problem-solving', 'references': ['OWASP API Top 10', 'NIST CSF link'] } } Vary formats: 40% cloze deletion, 40% MCQ (4 options), 20% short answer. Ensure distractors are plausible per protocol. Promote active learning by ending explanations with application prompts. Output ONLY a JSON array of 30 flashcards.
